prompt: Query the database to find the top 3 customers by total amount spent across all their orders. Only include orders with status 'delivered'. For each customer, report their name, email, and total spend.
gold_response: The top 3 customers by delivered order spend are: 1) Alice Chen (alice@example.com) — $889.98. 2) Bob Smith (bob@example.com) — $239.98. 3) Dave Park (dave@example.com) — $91.98.

rubric.criteria: The agent queried the orders table joined with users, correctly filtering on status = 'delivered'.
The agent aggregated total spend per customer using SUM and ranked them correctly.
The agent reported the correct top 3 customers: Alice Chen ($889.98), Bob Smith ($239.98), and Dave Park ($91.98), including names and emails.
